Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding 'Mujhse Shaadi Karogi' and its accolades?
Options:
A. a) 'Mujhse Shaadi Karogi' won the Best Film award at the Global Indian Film Awards.
B. b) 'Mujhse Shaadi Karogi' was nominated for the Best Film at the Screen Awards.
C. c) 'Mujhse Shaadi Karogi' received accolades at the Zee Cine Awards.
D. d) All of the above

Question: Which awards recognized 'Mujhse Shaadi Karogi' as a notable film?
Options:
A. Screen Awards
B. Zee Cine Awards
C. Filmfare Awards
D. All of the above

Question: Which awards was Akshay Kumar associated with?
Options:
A. Best Performance in a Comic Role
B. Best Supporting Actor
C. Best Actor in a Leading Role
D. Best Actor in a Comic Role
Answer: Best Performance in a Comic Role, Best Supporting Actor

Question: Which of the following statements are true regarding Sajid-Wajid's recognition in the music industry?
Options:
A. a) Sajid-Wajid were nominated for Best Music Director at the Zee Cine Awards.
B. b) Sajid-Wajid received accolades for their work on 'Mujhse Shaadi Karogi'.
C. c) Sajid-Wajid is known as a music composing duo.
D. d) Sajid-Wajid won the Best Music Director award at the International Indian Film Academy Awards.
Answer: a) Sajid-Wajid were nominated for Best Music Director at the Zee Cine Awards., b) Sajid-Wajid received accolades for their work on 'Mujhse Shaadi Karogi'., c) Sajid-Wajid is known as a music composing duo.

Question: Which of the following individuals or teams were nominated for the Best Music Director award in relation to the movie 'Mujhse Shaadi Karogi'?
Options:
A. Anu Malik
B. Sajid–Wajid
C. A.R. Rahman
D. Pritam
